com.poesys.db.dao.update

Class UpdateCacheCollectionByKey<T extends IDbDto>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.db.dao.update.UpdateCollectionByKey<T>
      • com.poesys.db.dao.update.UpdateCacheCollectionByKey<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of IDbDto to update
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdateCollection<T>

    public class UpdateCacheCollectionByKey<T extends IDbDto>
extends UpdateCollectionByKey<T>
implements IUpdateCollection<T>
    A subclass of the UpdateCollectionByKey class that removes all the data transfer objects (DTOs) in the updated list from the DTO cache
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.sql.Connection connection,
          java.util.Collection<T> dtos)
            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                   BatchException
        Description copied from interface: IUpdateCollection
        An interface for a Command-pattern class that updates the contents of a collection of objects in the database. The data transfer objects (DTOs) must contain values for the primary key and must have all modifiable fields set to reflect the complete, desired state for the object in the database, including any composite aggregate parts belonging to the object.
        Specified by:
        update in interface IUpdateCollection<T extends IDbDto>
        Overrides:
        update in class UpdateCollectionByKey<T extends IDbDto>
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection with which to update the data
        dtos - the data transfer objects containing the desired state of the objects
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there is a SQL error with an update
        BatchException - when there is some kind of batch processing error
